cmd.name: Strenghten Stronghold Defences I
cmd.description: Makes the defenders at the stronghold walls level 12

cmd.description: Makes the defenders at the stronghold walls level 24

cmd.name: Forge spears
cmd.description: Reduces Numidian Footmen cost by half (the command time is reduced by 75% and the cost is paid back from the second time)
cmd.param: NReqSet, CLibyanFootman, , NReqSet, Specialization, default, NameSet, CLibyanFootman, , SetsSet, Specialization, researched, SetsSet, SpecializedUnit, 1, SetsSet, ResearchedLibyanFootman, yes, NameSet, Forge spears

cmd.name: Forge javelins
cmd.description: Reduces Javelin Throwers cost by half (the command time is reduced by 75% and the cost is paid back from the second time)
cmd.param: NReqSet, CJavelinThrower, , NReqSet, Specialization, default, NameSet, CJavelinThrower, , SetsSet, Specialization, researched, SetsSet, SpecializedUnit, 2, SetsSet, ResearchedJavelinThrower, yes, NameSet, Forge javelins

cmd.name: Forge swords
cmd.description: Reduces Berber Assassins cost by half (the command time is reduced by 75% and the cost is paid back from the second time)
cmd.param: NReqSet, CBerberAssassin, , NReqSet, Specialization, default, NameSet, CBerberAssassin, , SetsSet, Specialization, researched, SetsSet, SpecializedUnit, 3, SetsSet, ResearchedBerberAssassin, yes, NameSet, Forge swords

cmd.description: Reduces Macemen cost by half (the command time is reduced by 75% and the cost is paid back from the second time)
cmd.param: NReqSet, CMaceman, , NReqSet, Specialization, default, NameSet, CMaceman, , SetsSet, Specialization, researched, SetsSet, SpecializedUnit, 4, SetsSet, ResearchedMaceman, yes, NameSet, Forge maces

cmd.name: Forge pikes

cmd.name: Forge shields
cmd.description: Reduces Numidian Horsemen cost by half (the command time is reduced by 75% and the cost is paid back from the second time)
cmd.param: NReqSet, CHorseman, , NReqSet, Specialization, default, NameSet, CHorseman, , SetsSet, Specialization, researched, SetsSet, SpecializedUnit, 7, SetsSet, ResearchedHorseman, yes, NameSet, Forge shields

cmd.name: StopSpecialization1
cmd.description: Stops the production of Spears to start another
cmd.param: ReqSet, CLibyanFootman, , SetsSet, Specialization, , SetsSet, CLibyanFootman, , SetsSet, SpecializedUnit, , SetsSet, Forge spears

cmd.name: StopSpecialization2
cmd.description: Stops the production of Javelins to start another
cmd.param: ReqSet, CJavelinThrower, , SetsSet, Specialization, , SetsSet, CJavelinThrower, , SetsSet, SpecializedUnit, , SetsSet, Forge javelins

cmd.name: StopSpecialization3
cmd.description: Stops the production of Swords to start another
cmd.param: ReqSet, CBerberAssassin, , SetsSet, Specialization, , SetsSet, CBerberAssassin, , SetsSet, SpecializedUnit, , SetsSet, Forge swords

cmd.name: StopSpecialization4
cmd.description: Stops the production of Maces to start another
cmd.param: ReqSet, CMaceman, , SetsSet, Specialization, , SetsSet, CMaceman, , SetsSet, SpecializedUnit, , SetsSet, Forge maces

cmd.name: StopSpecialization5
cmd.description: Stops the production of Pikes to start another
cmd.param: ReqSet, CNumidianRider, , SetsSet, Specialization, , SetsSet, CNumidianRider, , SetsSet, SpecializedUnit, , SetsSet, Forge pikes

cmd.name: StopSpecialization6
cmd.description: Stops the production of Shields to start another
cmd.param: ReqSet, CHorseman, , SetsSet, Specialization, , SetsSet, CHorseman, , SetsSet, SpecializedUnit, , SetsSet, Forge shields

cmd.name: StopSpecialization
cmd.description: Stops the current production to start another
cmd.param: ReqSet, Specialization, , SetsSet, Specialization, , SetsSet, CLibyanFootman, , SetsSet, CJavelinThrower, , SetsSet, CBerberAssassin, , SetsSet, CMaceman, , SetsSet, CNumidianRider, , SetsSet, CHorseman, , SetsSet, SpecializedUnit, , SetsSet, Forge spears, , SetsSet, Forge javelins, , SetsSet, Forge swords, , SetsSet, Forge maces, , SetsSet, Forge pikes, , SetsSet, Forge shields

cmd.name: Charm of Seth
cmd.description: Gives a Damage charm (+4 damage) to up to 65 warriors around the townhall
cmd.param: Damage charm

cmd.name: Charm of Thoth
cmd.description: Gives an Armor charm (+4 armor) to up to 65 warriors around the townhall
cmd.param: Armor charm

cmd.name: Charm of Ra
cmd.description: Gives a Health charm (+40 health) to up to 65 warriors around the townhall
cmd.param: Health charm

cmd.name: Charm of Isis
cmd.description: Gives a Knowledge charm (+4 levels) to up to 65 warriors around the townhall
cmd.param: Knowledge charm

cmd.name: Axemen production
cmd.description: Increases the number of Axemen you can have by 10

cmd.name: Javelin production
cmd.description: Increases the number of Huntresses you can have by 10

cmd.name: Macemen production
cmd.description: Increases the number of Macemen you can have by 10
